Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: feedback from teachers help me provoke more critical thinking as their feedback are usually more open ended. whereas GenAi would help me identify the issue directly as they may be more specific i would regard it as less trustworthy.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: feedbacks from teacher feels more reliable since they are the one teaching me and marking my assignments where i would generally trust the GenAI feedback less and take it more as a reference

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI tend to provide more specific feedback where teachers might give more open ended ones to provoke further critical thinking (but still depends on the teacher)
